entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-12
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • How to troubleshoot 'Nullable object must have a value' error? #27431
  • Group By Failure - Translation of 'Select' which contains grouping parameter without composition is not supported. #27426
  • Idea for EF Core 7: Fetch aggregate entity instance and related tables in single database trip by combining AsSplitQuery and AsSQLBatch #27384

Updated

  • Operations on IQueryable after GroupBy.Select #26748
    7.0.0
  • Suggestion about IAsyncQueryProvider namespace #27401
  • Configuring the owned type on the derived type first throws an exception #27404
    7.0.0
  • Optionally allow a different connection string to be used for SaveChanges #25024
    Backlog
  • Null Coalesce Operator between two join variable - throws exceptions #27386
  • ToLower not working with AsQueryable on sqlite #27378
  • Enum values fail to convert because EF has mapped them to the wrong enum when using .HasConversion<string> #27417
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Updated

  • [release/6.0] SQLite: Don't modify collection while enumerating inside ReclaimLeakedConnections #27428
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
